meanings.definition: The string of a bow, used to propel an arrow.
meanings.sent1: The archer carefully pulled back the bowstrings before releasing the arrow.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the bowstrings are taut and ready before aiming at the target.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the bowstrings to swing from tree to tree like a tiny acrobat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like music, pulling at his heartstrings like the tension in bowstrings.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the bowstrings contrasted beautifully against the green of the forest.

meanings.definition: To string a bow with a bowstring.
meanings.sent1: He carefully bowstrings the new bow for the upcoming archery competition.
meanings.sent2: Remember to bowstrings the bow properly to avoid any accidents during practice.
meanings.sent3: She decided to bowstrings the bow in a unique pattern, creating a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to bowstrings her heart, pulling her closer with each sentence.
meanings.sent5: The way he bowstrings the bow with precision and skill is truly impressive.
